About Me

Hi! I’m WorldOfCharacters, a 14-year-old girl from Fort Worth, Texas.

I love drawing and creating comics! I also paint with watercolors.

Some of my favorite things include:

  • A Bug’s Life
  • Wednesday
  • Smiling Critters
  • The Grinch
  • How To Train Your Dragon
  • Five Nights at Freddies
  • Stranger Things

Thanks for checking out my comics!
